name: amfori
goal: We are a the leading business association of global commerce that enables organisations to enhance human prosperity, use natural resources responsibly and drive open trade globally.  We call this Trade with Purpose.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: We are concerned with all initiatives that concern international trade and sustainability.
